comments: Mrs. Johnson really made the class a fun learining experience for me.The first day of class,I didn\'t know so much about Sociology but now I do.She helped out alot and you earned the grade you got.So if you got a poor grade it was because you earned it.I would definitely recommend Mrs.Johnson if you have to take SOC.

If it was not for having to read the book I would have learned nothing in this class. She was pretty much useless for notes and for any in class learning on the information that was to be included in exams. She made it seem like she was helping you out with every exam, but that is bogus, it is just a way to try and make up for lack of teaching

Treated a 100 level lecture class with almost 50 students like a 400 level discussion class (not a good idea) She did give us everything needed to pass the tests and even gave these "cheat sheets." I did not like the fact that written answers had had to come from the book. Felt very middle school-like. So did the excessive amount of busy work.

Ms. Carouthers is awesome, she makes class very fun and interesting. She makes you want to learn about Soc. If you are shy I would recommend not to take this class because she highly values class discussions. Gives you all the information you need to pass exams.
She is a really good teacher. She makes the class super fun! My class was 3 hours long and it went by really fast. I would highly recommend her to other students.
